entry.title: Azure-Samples/aks-openai-terraform
entry.summary: This article shows how to deploy an Azure Kubernetes Service(AKS) cluster and Azure OpenAI Service via Terraform and how to deploy a Terraform chatbot that authenticates against Azure OpenAI using Azure AD workload identity and calls the Chat Completion API of a ChatGPT model.
